section.27: Pilgrims Prevented from Completing the Pilgrimage

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ï·º) said, "Whoever performs Hajj to this House (Ka`ba) and does not approach his wife for sexual relations nor commits sins (while performing Hajj), he will come out as sinless as a newlyborn child. (Just delivered by his mother)
